errors.error_description: The installation instructions include `pip install vtkplotter`. `vtkplotter` is an outdated name for a dependency (`vedo`) that is already installed automatically with `brainrender`, so this command is unnecessary and may cause conflicts.
correction_candidates: Replace `pip install vtkplotter` with `pip install vedo`.
Change the installation to `pip install brainrender[vtk]`.
Run `pip install brainrender --no-deps` followed by `pip install vtkplotter`.
